content.description: Figure 1. Change in energy over the course of four chemical reactions
content.question: Based on the data in Figure 1, which of the following most likely represents the change in energy that occurs when <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mtext>ATP</mtext> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> hydrolysis is coupled with the phosphorylation of a substrate?

choices.label: Line <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> hydrolysis, and line <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents phosphorylation of a substrate.

Line <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> hydrolysis, and line <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents phosphorylation of a substrate.

Line <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> hydrolysis, and line <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents phosphorylation of a substrate.

Line <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> hydrolysis, and line <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents phosphorylation of a substrate.

content.answer: Line <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents <math alttext="A T P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> hydrolysis, and line <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represents phosphorylation of a substrate.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
